channel.title: Docker.com on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Docker.com on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Deterministic AI Testing with Session Recording in cagent
item.description: AI agents introduce a challenge that traditional software doesn’t have: non-determinism. The same prompt can produce different outputs across runs, making reliable testing difficult. Add API costs and latency to the mix, and developer productivity takes a hit. Session recording in cagent addresses this directly. Record an AI interaction once, replay it indefinitely—with identical results,... Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/deterministic-ai-testing-with-session-recording-in-cagent/
